title: Authors and Citation
text: Shiying Xiao. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Xiao S (2024). ProductSpace: Analysis Visualization Product Space. R package version 0.1.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ProductSpace: Analysis and Visualization of Product Space},   author = {Shiying Xiao},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0}, }

title: ProductSpace
text: goal ProductSpace provide tools analysis visualization product space.

title: ProductSpace
text: can install development version ProductSpace GitHub :

title: Complexity Index — complexity
text: Compute economic complexity index (ECI) product complexity index (PCI) (Hidalgo Hausmann 2009)  based RCA values.

title: Complexity Index — complexity
text: RCAmat economy--product matrix RCA values. measure character string specifying measure compute: "eci": economic complexity index. "pci": product complexity index.

title: Complexity Index — complexity
text: numeric vector measured values.

title: Complexity Index — complexity
text: Hidalgo CA, Hausmann R (2009). “Building Blocks Economic Complexity.” Proceedings National Academy Sciences, 106(26), 10570--10575. doi:10.1073/pnas.0900943106 .

title: Density and Distance — densdist
text: Compute density distance (Hausmann Klinger 2006)  based RCA proximity values.

title: Density and Distance — densdist
text: RCAmat economy--product matrix RCA values. PROXmat product--product matrix proximity values. measure character string specifying measure compute: "density": new product’s proximity economy's current export basket. "distance": economy's ability enter specific product.

title: Density and Distance — densdist
text: economy--product matrix measured values.

title: Density and Distance — densdist
text: Hausmann R, Klinger B (2006). “Structural Transformation Patterns Comparative Advantage Product Space.” Technical Report CID Working Paper . 128, Harvard University. http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HUL.InstRepos:42482330.

title: Diversity and Ubiquity — divubq
text: Compute diversity/diversification ubiquity (Hidalgo 2009)  based RCA values.

title: Diversity and Ubiquity — divubq
text: RCAmat economy--product matrix RCA values. measure character string specifying measure compute: "diversity": number products economy produces. "ubiquity": number economies export product.

title: Diversity and Ubiquity — divubq
text: numeric vector measured values.

title: Diversity and Ubiquity — divubq
text: Hidalgo CA (2009). “Dynamics Economic Complexity Product Space 42 year period.” Technical Report CID Working Paper . 189, Harvard University. https://dash.harvard.edu/handle/1/37366208.

title: PRODY and EXPY — productivity
text: Compute PRODY EXPY (Hausmann et al. 2007)  based export gross domestic product (GDP) data.

title: PRODY and EXPY — productivity
code: productivity(   expData,   gdpData,   measure = c("prody", "expy"),   econ = "economy",   prod = "product",   exp = "export",   gdp = "GDP" )

title: PRODY and EXPY — productivity
text: expData data frame matrix containing export data. data frame, columns representing economies, products, export values. matrix, economy--product matrix export values. gdpData data frame containing GDP data. measure character string specifying measure compute: "prody": income/productivity level. "expy": income/productivity level country's export basket. econ character string (default = "economy") specifying column name economies expData data frame. prod character string (default = "product") specifying column name products expData data frame. exp character string (default = "export") specifying column name export values expData data frame. gdp character string (default = "GDP") specifying column name GDP values gdpData data frame.

title: PRODY and EXPY — productivity
text: numeric vector measured values.

title: PRODY and EXPY — productivity
text: Hausmann R, Hwang J, Rodrik D (2007). “Export Matters.” Journal Economic Growth, 12(1), 1--25. doi:10.1007/s10887-006-9009-4 .

title: Proximity — proximity
text: Compute proximity (Hidalgo et al. 2007)  based RCA values.

title: Proximity — proximity
text: RCAmat economy--product matrix RCA values.

title: Proximity — proximity
text: product--product matrix proximity values.

title: Proximity — proximity
text: Hidalgo CA, Klinger B, Barabási , Hausmann R (2007). “Product Space Conditions Development Nations.” Science, 317(5837), 482--487. doi:10.1126/science.1144581 .

what: Revealed Comparative Advantage Index / Balassa Index — rca
title: Revealed Comparative Advantage Index / Balassa Index — rca
text: Compute revealed comparative advantage (RCA) index (Balassa 1965)  given dataset.

title: Revealed Comparative Advantage Index / Balassa Index — rca
code: rca(   data,   binary = TRUE,   threshold = 1,   econ = "economy",   prod = "product",   exp = "export" )

title: Revealed Comparative Advantage Index / Balassa Index — rca
text: data data frame matrix containing data. data frame, columns representing economies, products, export values. matrix, economy--product matrix export values. binary boolean (default = TRUE) specifying whether return binary RCA values (1 RCA >= threshold, 0 otherwise). threshold numeric value (default = 1) specifying threshold binary RCA values. econ character string (default = "economy") specifying column name economies data data frame. prod character string (default = "product") specifying column name products data data frame. exp character string (default = "export") specifying column name export values data data frame.

title: Revealed Comparative Advantage Index / Balassa Index — rca
text: economy--product matrix RCA values.

title: Revealed Comparative Advantage Index / Balassa Index — rca
text: Balassa B (1965). “Trade Liberalisation ``Revealed'' Comparative Advantage.” Manchester School, 33(2), 99--123. doi:10.1111/j.1467-9957.1965.tb00050.x .
